video.title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
video.synopsis: A high-schooler who's granted powers to make anyone instantly obedient dons a mask to lead Japan's rebellion against a long-invading Britannia.

episodes.synopsis: An exiled prince living under an assumed identity is imprisoned by militia but escapes with the help of a girl who endows him with special powers.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch contacts Kallen, one of the terrorists that appeared inside Shinjuku, and guides her to safety away from the Britannian army.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch looks into his mother's death. Back at school, he makes a discovery about a classmate and his special power; Suzaku is arrested for murder.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Suzaku is framed for murder as an excuse for the army to expel Honorary Britannians. Lelouch helps him escape and tries to recruit him as a rebel.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The green-haired girl moves into Lelouch's home. Now acquitted, Suzaku shows Princess Euphemia the city of Shinjuku, where they stop a murder attempt.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Suzaku and Lelouch face the prejudice of the Britannian students; a cat causes a scare; Lelouch's father delivers a speech at the Prince's funeral.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch recalls his last meeting with his father before his exile; when Cornelia sets a trap to expose Zero, Lelouch decides to build his own army.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: When a hotel and its occupants are seized by a Japanese terrorist group, Lelouch orchestrates a rescue and proclaims the formation of the Black Knights.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The Black Knights go after a cartel that makes a popular and dangerous drug, a battle that is especially personal for Kallen.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch and his Knights trail Cornelia and her army to the Front's headquarters, where Kallen uses her new Knightmare Frame to bring on a landslide.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: When the Black Knights take Narita, Euphemia orders Suzaku to rescue Cornelia, which leaves Lelouch cornered in the middle of a three-way battle.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Zero and his inner circle meet with a key player in the Japanese underground. In Tokyo, Shirley Fenette tells Zero of a significant casualty of war.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Villetta urges Shirley to secretly follow Lelouch's movements; Lelouch successfully blows up a freighter, then faces his own possible demise.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch follows Shirley to Narita, where a wounded Villetta is discovered, and the force behind Shirley's attack on Lelouch is unveiled.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Villetta awakens with partial amnesia; when C.C. falls prey to Mao's mind games, Lelouch goes to the rescue, vowing not to let his powers enslave him.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Milly meets with her prospective husband; when Mao kidnaps Nunnally, Lelouch and Suzaku join forces to save her, and C.C. deals with Mao.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: An art museum is opened in memory of Clovis; Lelouch recruits a new Black Knight just in time for a battle with Lancelot that produces a shock.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Suzaku becomes Euphemia's knight; Lelouch sets out to capture Suzaku and the Lancelot, but a Britannian battleship commander has a different plan.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: On Kamine Island, secret identities are unmasked, and ancient ruins belie a trap; the Chinese Federation helps the exiled Japanese stage an attack.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: The invaders meet resistance from the Britannian Army; Nina unwittingly bolsters Euphemia; C.C. and Zero rush into battle to help Suzaku.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Ohgi, Villetta, Euphemia, and Kallen hide their identities at the school festival, but when Euphemia's is revealed, she makes a fateful proclamation.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: A discussion of Japan's future goes haywire when Lelouch loses control of his powers and he sets Euphemia on a course toward an unthinkable massacre.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Euphemia tries to fight off the Geass as she struggles to survive; Zero announces his plan for the creation of a new nation, and a revolution begins.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Ashford Academy becomes headquarters for the Black Knights, as Suzaku defies them. Villetta's memory returns and Lelouch faces off with Cornelia.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch learns what Cornelia truly knows of his mother's murder; Lelouch goes to Kamine Island to save Nunnally and has a final showdown with Suzaku.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch Lamperouge returns to his usual life of being a lazy student and gambler, while his memory has been erased and filled with false records.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch gets his memory back and leads the Order of the Black Knights. After having stormed the Babel Tower, the Knights are attacked by a new Frame.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Zero declares the birth of the United States of Japan, but Guilford threatens to execute all the captured Black Knights if he refuses the challenge.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch has two major problems: he must escape from Rolo, who intends to kill him, and he must find a way to save the Black Knights.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Zero regains the trust of the Knights. At school, Suzaku’s return causes great interest, so the student council organize a party in his honor.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Making a surprise attack on the Pacific, the Black Knights turn their backs on Zero who infiltrated Nunnally to try to kidnap her.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch suffers a crisis. Nunnally’s election as governor general of Area 11 is accompanied by some more shocking news about her.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Zero’s decision to work on the Japanese Special Region creates concern among the Black Knights. Lelouch behaves strangely.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The Order of the Black Knights is now in China. The Chinese Federation is officially ruled by Lihua, the venerable sovereign.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: After Zero has kidnapped Lihua during her marriage to Prince Odysseus, a fight to the death starts between the Knights of the Black Order and Xing ke.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: The siege in the mausoleum seems to take a turn for the worse for Lelouch. The Chinese and Britannia forces are overwhelming.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch and Shirley come face-to-face. The boy must also reckon with the consequences of the misunderstandings created by involving Sayoko.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Shirley’s memory has come back. She can now remember everything about Lelouch. She contacts Suzaku, with the intention of unmasking Zero.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: After a tragic loss, Lelouch decides to eradicate the Cult of Geass, to raze the organization to the ground and to eliminate Rolo.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch comes to the showdown with his father the emperor, facing him in a parallel world. The final objective is close, but a revelation upsets him.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: The rising Federation of the United States will provide Lelouch with means and men to fight Britannia on equal terms.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch, while trying to save Nunnally, plays his last card: desperately and humbly imploring Suzaku to help him.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch and the Black Knights, helped by Jeremiah and Guilford, barely oppose Suzaku and the Other Knights of Rounds.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Taking advantage of the absence of Lelouch, in terrible physical and psychological conditions, Schneizel meets with the leaders of the Black Knights.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Marianne is revealed in her true form to C.C. and Zero is declared dead.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Having caught his father, Lelouch is now about to discover the truth about the death of his mother, who suddenly materializes before him.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch, now declared emperor, destroys all that until then had represented Britannia with the consent of Suzaku.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Schneizel takes Damocles to a high altitude to threaten every corner of the world with FLEIJA warheads. He is ready to kill in order to secure peace.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: While the Black Knights manage to penetrate into Avalon and rescue the hostages, Lelouch bursts into Damocles.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Lelouch uses the Geass and Nunnally and gets the key of Damocles. Thanks to that and to the FLEIJA, he has a power that cannot be challenged.
episodes.title: Episode 25
